details.environment: Arctic, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Grassland, Hill, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, [[/damage 1d8 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage if wielded with two hands, or [[/damage 1d8 + @mod + 2 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage with shillelagh.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Spellcasting. Belak is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, &Reference[poison]{poison} spray, shillelagh

1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, faerie &Reference[fire]{fire}, thunderwave

2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, flaming &Reference[sphere]{sphere}

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Whispering to the spirits of &Reference[nat]{nature}, you create one of the following effects within range:

  • You create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.
  • You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.
  • You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot &Reference[cube]{cube}.
  • You instantly light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a &Reference[con]{Constitution} saving throw or take 1d12 &Reference[poison]{poison} damage.

This spell's damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level (2d12), 11th level (3d12), and 17th level (4d12).

The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of &Reference[str]{Strength} for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon's damage die becomes a d8. The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn't already. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon.

materials.value: mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff

macro.name: Shillelagh

description.value:
A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on &Reference[undead]{undead} or constructs.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

Grasping weeds and vines sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.

A creature in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a &Reference[str]{Strength} saving throw or be &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by the entangling plants until the spell ends. A creature &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by the plants can use its action to make a &Reference[str]{Strength} check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.

When the spell ends, the conjured plants wilt away.

changes.value: You can take an action to break free by rolling a Strength Ability Check
turn=end, rollType=check, actionSave=true, saveAbility=str, saveDC=@attributes.spelldc, label=Restrained by Entangle

description.value:
Each object in a 20-foot &Reference[cube]{cube} within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.

Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being &Reference[invisible]{invisible}.

A wave of thunderous &Reference[force]{force} sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot &Reference[cube]{cube} originating from you must make a &Reference[con]{Constitution} saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 &Reference[thunder]{thunder} damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 10 feet away from you by the spell's effect, and the spell emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.
You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance, and the target's AC can't be less than 16, regardless of what kind of armor it is wearing.

A 5-foot-diameter &Reference[sphere]{sphere} of &Reference[fire]{fire} appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} must make a &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} saving throw. The creature takes 2d6 &Reference[fire]{fire} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

As a bonus action, you can move the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} up to 30 feet. If you ram the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} into a creature, that creature must make the saving throw against the sphere's damage, and the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} stops moving this turn.

When you move the &Reference[sphere]{sphere}, you can direct it over barriers up to 5 feet tall and jump it across pits up to 10 feet wide. The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} ignites flammable objects not being worn or carried, and it sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

materials.value: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron
